text.ascii: arjuna uvAca
text.ur: arjuna uvāca

text.ascii: adRzyamAnAs te daityA yodhayanti sma mAyayA
text.ur: adr̥śyamānās te daityā yodhayanti sma māyayā

text.ascii: adRzyAn astravIryeNa tAn apy aham ayodhayam
text.ur: adr̥śyān astravīryeṇa tān apy aham ayodhayam

text.ascii: gANDIvamuktA vizikhAH samyag astrapracoditAH
text.ur: gāṇḍīvamuktā viśikhāḥ samyag astrapracoditāḥ

text.ascii: acchindann uttamAGgAni yatra yatra sma te 'bhavan
text.ur: acchindann uttamāṅgāni yatra yatra sma te ’bhavan

text.ascii: tato nivAtakavacA vadhyamAnA mayA yudhi
text.ur: tato nivātakavacā vadhyamānā mayā yudhi

text.ascii: saMhRtya mAyAM sahasA prAvizan puram AtmanaH
text.ur: saṁhr̥tya māyāṁ sahasā prāviśan puram ātmanaḥ

text.ascii: vyapayAteSu daityeSu prAdurbhUte ca darzane
text.ur: vyapayāteṣu daityeṣu prādurbhūte ca darśane

text.ascii: apazyaM dAnavAMs tatra hatAJ zatasahasrazaH
text.ur: apaśyaṁ dānavāṁs tatra hatāñ śatasahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: viniSpiSTAni tatraiSAM zastrANy AbharaNAni ca
text.ur: viniṣpiṣṭāni tatraiṣāṁ śastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca

text.ascii: kUTazaH sma pradRzyante gAtrANi kavacAni ca
text.ud: कूटशः स्म प्रदृश्यन्ते गात्राणि कवचानि च
text.ur: kūṭaśaḥ sma pradr̥śyante gātrāṇi kavacāni ca

text.ascii: hayAnAM nAntaraM hy AsIt padAd vicalituM padam
text.ur: hayānāṁ nāntaraṁ hy āsīt padād vicalituṁ padam

text.ascii: utpatya sahasA tasthur antarikSagamAs tataH
text.ur: utpatya sahasā tasthur antarikṣagamās tataḥ

text.ascii: tato nivAtakavacA vyoma saMchAdya kevalam
text.ur: tato nivātakavacā vyoma saṁchādya kevalam

text.ascii: adRzyA hy abhyavartanta visRjantaH ziloccayAn
text.ur: adr̥śyā hy abhyavartanta visr̥jantaḥ śiloccayān

text.ascii: antarbhUmigatAz cAnye hayAnAM caraNAny atha
text.ur: antarbhūmigatāś cānye hayānāṁ caraṇāny atha

text.ascii: nyagRhNan dAnavA ghorA rathacakre ca bhArata
text.ur: nyagr̥hṇan dānavā ghorā rathacakre ca bhārata

text.ascii: vinigRhya harIn azvAn rathaM ca mama yudhyataH
text.ur: vinigr̥hya harīn aśvān rathaṁ ca mama yudhyataḥ

text.ascii: sarvato mAm acinvanta sarathaM dharaNIdharaiH
text.ur: sarvato mām acinvanta sarathaṁ dharaṇīdharaiḥ

text.ascii: parvatair upacIyadbhiH patamAnais tathAparaiH
text.ur: parvatair upacīyadbhiḥ patamānais tathāparaiḥ

text.ascii: sa dezo yatra vartAma guheva samapadyata
text.ud: स देशो यत्र वर्ताम गुहेव समपद्यत
text.ur: sa deśo yatra vartāma guheva samapadyata

text.ascii: parvataiz chAdyamAno 'haM nigRhItaiz ca vAjibhiH
text.ur: parvataiś chādyamāno ’haṁ nigr̥hītaiś ca vājibhiḥ

text.ascii: agacchaM paramAm ArtiM mAtalis tad alakSayat
text.ur: agacchaṁ paramām ārtiṁ mātalis tad alakṣayat

text.ascii: lakSayitvA tu mAM bhItam idaM vacanam abravIt
text.ur: lakṣayitvā tu māṁ bhītam idaṁ vacanam abravīt

text.ascii: arjunArjuna mA bhais tvaM vajram astram udIraya
text.ur: arjunārjuna mā bhais tvaṁ vajram astram udīraya

text.ascii: tato 'haM tasya tad vAkyaM zrutvA vajram udIrayam
text.ur: tato ’haṁ tasya tad vākyaṁ śrutvā vajram udīrayam

text.ascii: devarAjasya dayitaM vajram astraM narAdhipa
text.ur: devarājasya dayitaṁ vajram astraṁ narādhipa

text.ascii: acalaM sthAnam AsAdya gANDIvam anumantrya ca
text.ur: acalaṁ sthānam āsādya gāṇḍīvam anumantrya ca

text.ascii: amuJcaM vajrasaMsparzAn AyasAn nizitAJ zarAn
text.ur: amuñcaṁ vajrasaṁsparśān āyasān niśitāñ śarān

text.ascii: tato mAyAz ca tAH sarvA nivAtakavacAMz ca tAn
text.ud: ततो मायाश्च ताः सर्वा निवातकवचांश्च तान्
text.ur: tato māyāś ca tāḥ sarvā nivātakavacāṁś ca tān

text.ascii: te vajracoditA bANA vajrabhUtAH samAvizan
text.ur: te vajracoditā bāṇā vajrabhūtāḥ samāviśan

text.ascii: te vajravegAbhihatA dAnavAH parvatopamAH
text.ur: te vajravegābhihatā dānavāḥ parvatopamāḥ

text.ascii: itaretaram AzliSya nyapatan pRthivItale
text.ur: itaretaram āśliṣya nyapatan pr̥thivītale

text.ascii: antarbhUmau tu ye 'gRhNan dAnavA rathavAjinaH
text.ur: antarbhūmau tu ye ’gr̥hṇan dānavā rathavājinaḥ

text.ascii: anupravizya tAn bANAH prAhiNvan yamasAdanam
text.ur: anupraviśya tān bāṇāḥ prāhiṇvan yamasādanam

text.ascii: hatair nivAtakavacair nirastaiH parvatopamaiH
text.ur: hatair nivātakavacair nirastaiḥ parvatopamaiḥ

text.ascii: samAcchAdyata dezaH sa vikIrNair iva parvataiH
text.ur: samācchādyata deśaḥ sa vikīrṇair iva parvataiḥ

text.ascii: na hayAnAM kSatiH kA cin na rathasya na mAtaleH
text.ud: न हयानां क्षतिः काचिन्न रथस्य न मातलेः
text.ur: na hayānāṁ kṣatiḥ kā cin na rathasya na mātaleḥ

text.ascii: mama cAdRzyata tadA tad adbhutam ivAbhavat
text.ur: mama cādr̥śyata tadā tad adbhutam ivābhavat

text.ascii: tato mAM prahasan rAjan mAtaliH pratyabhASata
text.ur: tato māṁ prahasan rājan mātaliḥ pratyabhāṣata

text.ascii: naitad arjuna deveSu tvayi vIryaM yadIkSyate
text.ur: naitad arjuna deveṣu tvayi vīryaṁ yadīkṣyate

text.ascii: hateSv asurasaMgheSu dArAs teSAM tu sarvazaH
text.ur: hateṣv asurasaṁgheṣu dārās teṣāṁ tu sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: prAkrozan nagare tasmin yathA zaradi lakSmaNAH
text.ur: prākrośan nagare tasmin yathā śaradi lakṣmaṇāḥ

text.ascii: tato mAtalinA sArdham ahaM tat puram abhyayAm
text.ur: tato mātalinā sārdham ahaṁ tat puram abhyayām

text.ascii: trAsayan rathaghoSeNa nivAtakavacastriyaH
text.ur: trāsayan rathaghoṣeṇa nivātakavacastriyaḥ

text.ascii: tAn dRSTvA dazasAhasrAn mayUrasadRzAn hayAn
text.ur: tān dr̥ṣṭvā daśasāhasrān mayūrasadr̥śān hayān

text.ascii: rathaM ca ravisaMkAzaM prAdravan gaNazaH striyaH
text.ur: rathaṁ ca ravisaṁkāśaṁ prādravan gaṇaśaḥ striyaḥ

text.ascii: tAbhir AbharaNaiH zabdas trAsitAbhiH samIritaH
text.ur: tābhir ābharaṇaiḥ śabdas trāsitābhiḥ samīritaḥ

text.ascii: zilAnAm iva zaileSu patantInAm abhUt tadA
text.ur: śilānām iva śaileṣu patantīnām abhūt tadā

text.ascii: vitrastA daityanAryas tAH svAni vezmAny athAvizan
text.ur: vitrastā daityanāryas tāḥ svāni veśmāny athāviśan

text.ascii: bahuratnavicitrANi zAtakumbhamayAni ca
text.ur: bahuratnavicitrāṇi śātakumbhamayāni ca

text.ascii: tad adbhutAkAram ahaM dRSTvA nagaram uttamam
text.ur: tad adbhutākāram ahaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā nagaram uttamam

text.ascii: viziSTaM devanagarAd apRcchaM mAtaliM tataH
text.ur: viśiṣṭaṁ devanagarād apr̥cchaṁ mātaliṁ tataḥ

text.ascii: idam evaMvidhaM kasmAd devatA nAvizanty uta
text.ur: idam evaṁvidhaṁ kasmād devatā nāviśanty uta

text.ascii: puraMdarapurAd dhIdaM viziSTam iti lakSaye
text.ur: puraṁdarapurād dhīdaṁ viśiṣṭam iti lakṣaye

text.ascii: mAtalir uvAca
text.ur: mātalir uvāca

text.ascii: AsId idaM purA pArtha devarAjasya naH puram
text.ud: आसीदिदं पुरा पार्थ देवराजस्य नः पुरम्
text.ur: āsīd idaṁ purā pārtha devarājasya naḥ puram

text.ascii: tato nivAtakavacair itaH pracyAvitAH surAH
text.ur: tato nivātakavacair itaḥ pracyāvitāḥ surāḥ

text.ascii: tapas taptvA mahat tIvraM prasAdya ca pitAmaham
text.ur: tapas taptvā mahat tīvraṁ prasādya ca pitāmaham

text.ascii: idaM vRtaM nivAsAya devebhyaz cAbhayaM yudhi
text.ur: idaṁ vr̥taṁ nivāsāya devebhyaś cābhayaṁ yudhi

text.ascii: tataH zakreNa bhagavAn svayambhUr abhicoditaH
text.ur: tataḥ śakreṇa bhagavān svayambhūr abhicoditaḥ

text.ascii: vidhattAM bhagavAn atrety Atmano hitakAmyayA
text.ur: vidhattāṁ bhagavān atrety ātmano hitakāmyayā

text.ascii: tata ukto bhagavatA diSTam atreti vAsavaH
text.ur: tata ukto bhagavatā diṣṭam atreti vāsavaḥ

text.ascii: bhavitAntas tvam evaiSAM dehenAnyena vRtrahan
text.ur: bhavitāntas tvam evaiṣāṁ dehenānyena vr̥trahan

text.ascii: tata eSAM vadhArthAya zakro 'strANi dadau tava
text.ud: तत एषां वधार्थाय शक्रोऽस्त्राणि ददौ तव
text.ur: tata eṣāṁ vadhārthāya śakro ’strāṇi dadau tava

text.ascii: na hi zakyAH surair hantuM ya ete nihatAs tvayA
text.ud: न हि शक्याः सुरैर्हन्तुं य एते निहतास्त्वया
text.ur: na hi śakyāḥ surair hantuṁ ya ete nihatās tvayā

text.ascii: kAlasya pariNAmena tatas tvam iha bhArata
text.ur: kālasya pariṇāmena tatas tvam iha bhārata

text.ascii: eSAm antakaraH prAptas tat tvayA ca kRtaM tathA
text.ur: eṣām antakaraḥ prāptas tat tvayā ca kr̥taṁ tathā

text.ascii: dAnavAnAM vinAzArthaM mahAstrANAM mahad balam
text.ur: dānavānāṁ vināśārthaṁ mahāstrāṇāṁ mahad balam

text.ascii: grAhitas tvaM mahendreNa puruSendra tad uttamam
text.ur: grāhitas tvaṁ mahendreṇa puruṣendra tad uttamam

text.ascii: arjuna uvAca
text.ur: arjuna uvāca

text.ascii: tataH pravizya nagaraM dAnavAMz ca nihatya tAn
text.ud: ततः प्रविश्य नगरं दानवांश्च निहत्य तान्
text.ur: tataḥ praviśya nagaraṁ dānavāṁś ca nihatya tān

text.ascii: punar mAtalinA sArdham agacchaM devasadma tat
text.ur: punar mātalinā sārdham agacchaṁ devasadma tat
